ch0255_00_melon/7101_0701_01_10:
Being on a three-person team is a new
experience for me. It’s pretty fun, but I’m
having trouble getting used to it.
ch0255_00_melon/7101_0701_02_10: The other day, I almost froze my team member.
ch0255_00_melon/7102_0701_01_10:
There’s a lot of young talent here. It feels great
to be around!
ch0255_00_melon/7102_0701_02_10:
All righty! I wonder if anyone here can compete
with how tough I am.
ch0255_00_melon/7103_0701_01_10:
I like teaming up with other Ice-type Trainers.
It lets me battle without holding back.
ch0255_00_melon/7103_0701_02_10:
But even if a Flying-type or Dragon-type Pokémon
Trainer is on my team, I’m not going to hold back!
ch0255_00_melon/7104_0701_01_10: I think my battle style is quite severe.
ch0255_00_melon/7104_0701_02_10: I don’t just attack—I use tactics too, when needed.
ch0255_00_melon/7104_0701_03_10:
My battles may not always be the flashy kind that
audiences seem to like... But it is what it is.
ch0255_00_melon/7105_0701_01_10:
You must be getting used to what a severe battle
is like, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0255_00_melon/7105_0701_02_10:
But don’t push yourself too hard. Being disciplined
is one thing, but overworking yourself is quite
different!
ch0255_00_melon/1701_0701_02_10: Take this, dear. I kept it for you.
ch0255_00_melon/1701_0702_01_10:
You don’t need to thank me. Just do your
best, love!
ch0255_00_melon/2501_0701_01_10:
Ice-type Pokémon have powerful attacks, but
they’re not so good at defending.
ch0255_00_melon/2501_0701_02_10:
Even if you think you’re in a battle you’re sure to
win, the tables could turn in an instant if you let
your guard down!
ch0255_00_melon/2501_0701_03_10: It may sound severe, but I enjoy battles like that.
ch0255_00_melon/2501_0702_01_10:
If you were to visit my Gym, you seem like the
type to walk right into its pitfalls.
ch0255_00_melon/2501_0702_02_10:
I want to teach the importance of keeping your
guard up at all times. That’s why my Gym is full
of traps!
ch0255_00_melon/2511_0701_01_10:
My son Gordie is a Rock-type Gym Leader.
He’s a bit of a rebel, that one.
ch0255_00_melon/2511_0701_02_10:
Ever since we had a big fight, we haven’t had the
chance to talk much.
ch0255_00_melon/2511_0701_03_10:
But I’m still his number-one fan, and I’ll
always be watching over him.
ch0255_00_melon/2511_0702_01_10:
If there’s something you want to do, just believe in
yourself and do it.
ch0255_00_melon/2511_0702_02_10:
Don’t worry about failing. For some things, you’ll
never know the outcome unless you try.
ch0255_00_melon/2511_0702_03_10: If you’re in trouble, you can always let me know.
ch0255_00_melon/3001_0701_01_10:
Did you have a proper breakfast, love? Three
meals a day is what I stick to.
ch0255_00_melon/3003_0701_01_10:
Are you interested in my training regimen? Feel
free to tag along, but I’ll only accept your best!
ch0255_00_melon/3005_0701_01_10:
It’s chilly at night, love. Be sure to bundle up when
you sleep so you don’t catch a cold!
